originalText.text: We started seeing Dr Amy when my daughter was 3. She's absolutely amazing with kids. My daughter LOVES going to Dr Amy. She creates a friendly environment for kids, and is so patient and kind. We actually moved to Queens and still drive in to see her - she is a gem!

text.text: We started seeing Dr Amy when my daughter was 3. She's absolutely amazing with kids. My daughter LOVES going to Dr Amy. She creates a friendly environment for kids, and is so patient and kind. We actually moved to Queens and still drive in to see her - she is a gem!

originalText.text: My 7 year old son has been seeing Dr. Amy since his first dental visit years ago and I would not take him anywhere else.  Dr. Amy is amazing with children and my son loves going to see her.  She is so knowledgeable and explains everything so clearly and is always available for any questions.  I can't say enough wonderful things!

text.text: My 7 year old son has been seeing Dr. Amy since his first dental visit years ago and I would not take him anywhere else.  Dr. Amy is amazing with children and my son loves going to see her.  She is so knowledgeable and explains everything so clearly and is always available for any questions.  I can't say enough wonderful things!

originalText.text: I was terrified to bring my sensory sensitive daughter to the dentist. I knew I needed to find someone warm, friendly and welcoming. Dr. Amy was recommended to me by a friend and she did not disappoint!  My daughter who I expected would hide, cry, and clamp her mouth shut did the exact opposite. Dr. Amy was fun and gentle and gave me all the information I needed to make sure we prevent issues later on. I’m so glad we went and that my daughter doesn’t have to be afraid of the dentist!

text.text: I was terrified to bring my sensory sensitive daughter to the dentist. I knew I needed to find someone warm, friendly and welcoming. Dr. Amy was recommended to me by a friend and she did not disappoint!  My daughter who I expected would hide, cry, and clamp her mouth shut did the exact opposite. Dr. Amy was fun and gentle and gave me all the information I needed to make sure we prevent issues later on. I’m so glad we went and that my daughter doesn’t have to be afraid of the dentist!

originalText.text: We absolutely LOVE Dr Amy! My girls felt super comfortable in her chair and they still talk about going back to the dentist! I highly recommend her!! I can’t say enough good things!!

text.text: We absolutely LOVE Dr Amy! My girls felt super comfortable in her chair and they still talk about going back to the dentist! I highly recommend her!! I can’t say enough good things!!

originalText.text: Dr. Amy is amazing! So kind and gentle. Her personality makes it easy to ask questions. Your kids will love her!! Highly recommend !
